```{python}
import ssb_pubmd as ssb
```

{% endif -%}

{% for block in section.blocks -%}

{% if block.type == "highchart" -%}

```{python}
{{block.dataframe}}

highchart = ssb.Highchart(
    title="{{ block.metadata.title }}",
    graph_type="{{ block.metadata.graph_type }}",
    dataframe=df,
    xlabel="{{ block.metadata.xlabel }}",
    ylabel="{{ block.metadata.ylabel }}",
)
ssb.create("{{ block.key }}", highchart)
```

{% elif block.type == "factbox" -%}

```{python}
factbox = ssb.Factbox(
    title="{{ block.metadata.title }}",
    display_type="{{ block.metadata.display_type }}",
)
ssb.create("{{ block.key }}", factbox)
```

{% endif -%}
